events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to return it and get a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request to return the product for money back.
An agent specializing in refund cases has been assigned to handle this return request.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and reason for return?
To proceed with the refund, please share your order details and specify why you want to return the product.
My order number is #4567821. The product didn’t fit my needs as described, so I want to return it and get my money back.
We have accepted your return request. Please ship the product back within 14 days using the prepaid label we’ll email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label. I will send the package back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned product and processed a full refund to your original payment method today.
Just following up to confirm you have received the refund successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing your refund case now. Feel free to contact us anytime if you have more questions or concerns.
